title: TON (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK TON
Implements a timer with a turn-on delay
(* Example declaration *)
TONInst
:
TON
;
(* Example in ST *)
TONInst
(
IN
:=
VarBOOL1
,
PT
:=
T#5s
);
VarBOOL2
:=
TONInst.Q
;

rows.Name: IN
rows.Comment: Rising edge: starts delay counterFalling edge: resets delay counter

rows: Elapsed time since rising edge atIN
